mapper.select: select id, code, name, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, name, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type

select id, code, name, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type
where ${value}
